channel.title: Irregularity - NeXus [FUTURE BASS]
channel.description:
:soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/xenocutter/irregularity
Hey guys!
I’m here to announce my new EP, Irregularity, planned to release mid-July!
It all starts with this track here— Irregularity! Here’s the planned layout:
Irregularity (Future Bass) Comatose (Synthwave) 黒世界 (Lo-Fi) Below Zero (DnB) ShiFt (Dubstep) Gravity (House) Blue Moon Etude (Orchestral)
With this, I hope you enjoy the first track, Irregularity!
